bug_report.Title: User can't Log In with valid credentials
bug_report.Environment: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Version 21H1, Build 19043.1586, Google Chrome Version 99.0.4844.51
bug_report.Description: When trying to log in with valid credentials an error group 500 is displayed
bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: <1="Navigate to https://ksendzov.com/login"> <2="type 'VadimKsendzov' in the 'username' field"> <3="type 'poplomot' in the 'password' field"> <4="click on 'Login' button">
bug_report.Actual_Result: Error message '418 I'm a teapot' message is displayed
bug_report.Expected_Result: User logged in. Home page is displayed
